name: Matchetris: Endless Match 3
description:
Never seen before first ever Endless Match-3 game - Matchetris!

Tetris-look minimalist-style modern design, custom music and sound FX, special super boosters and endless gameplay with no additional payments.

Currently game is Windows 64-bit only, supports English and Russian languages, has one custom made musical track.

In future updates:

- new gameplay features and possibilities

- many new design themes

- more musical tracks and sound FX

- more localization languages

...and all of these are for FREE!

Leave your comments and suggest new features, improvements and bug reports.
